.

Walk or take a bus ($0.25) from the bus station to parque Orellano.

Unfortunately the taxis have fixed the price to and from the border into town at $3/trip, even though this is more than it should be (or would be if they had meters).

At parque Orellano, you can catch a taxi to the border on one side of the park, or a colectivo ($0.75) from the other side.

value: content=An affordable, but nice hotel in the center of town. Cable TV, private bathrooms with hot water. Priced for backpackers.

is just on the other side of the border and can be reached with collectivos or taxis.
